text: Jorge Liberato Urosa y Savino (28 August 1942 â€“ 23 September 2021) was a Venezuelan prelate of the Catholic Church. He was auxiliary bishop of Caracas from 1982 to 1990, Archbishop of Valencia from 1990 to 2005, and Archbishop of Caracas from 2005 to 2018. He was made a cardinal in 2006. On 27 August 2021, Urosa was hospitalized in Caracas under critical condition with COVID-19. He died on 23 September 2021 from the infection, aged 79. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Caracas Category:Cardinals of the Roman Catholic Church Category:People from Caracas
title: Jorge Liberato Urosa Savino
